
# AR2SISV
Convert activation_record.plist to IC-Info.sisv

Small, shitty-written utility to convert activation_record.plist to IC-Info.sisv.

IC-Info.sisv is important to get iServices working on iDevices (such as iCloud login, Facetime, iMessage).

Every activation record has a structure like this:


## activation_record.plist
	<dict>
		<key>AccountTokenCertificate</key>
		<data>| base64 |</data>
		<key>DeviceCertificate</key>
		<data>| base64 |</data>
		<key>FairPlayKeyData</key>
		<data></data>
		<key>AccountToken</key>
		<data>| base64 |</data>
		<key>AccountTokenSignature</key>
		<data>| base64 |</data>
	</dict>


The FairPlayKeyData is a base64 encoded cert. 
When decoding this base64 and decoding the base64 content which is inside this cert, we get the IC-Info.sisv. You can be sure you found the correct data if the filesize is 1140 bytes.

Enjoy :)
